overview:
Lin Miao, age 23 (Featured in Fortune, Business Week, Entrepreneurship Magazine, Fortune Small Business and WSRadio) is a leading expert in emerging media technologies such as performance advertising. He is currently Chief Executive Officer for Tatto Media, the world’s largest performance advertising network. In 2007, along with his business partners were named 2007 top 25 Entrepreneurs under 25 by Business Week. In 2008, Tatto Media was named Top Global 250 company by AlwaysOn.

Founded 7DollarStuff LLC during the end of his Freshman year in College, Lin grew the company to serve thousands of customers in all 50 U.S. States and over 15 different countries before selling it in 2005. In 2005, Lin co-founded Tatto Media, a performance advertising network focused on utilizing technology to produce immediate results. Tatto Media enables advertisers to target their specific audience with exact accuracy, by partnering with thousands of premium publishers and analyzing billions of anonymous behavioral data points.

With offices in Boston, Seattle and Los Angeles, “Tatto” Media is an Italian translation expressing “Authentic” Media. With proven next generation behavioral and creative optimization technologies, Tatto Media is fast becoming a technology staple.

Born in China, raised in Australia and currently resides in Boston, Massachusetts.
